definition: to encourage virtue and punish evil (idiom); fig. poetic justice/you get what's coming to you
to advise/to urge/to try to persuade/to exhort/to console/to soothe

sentences.english: In the Japanese Edo Period, the literary thought of "promoting virtues and punishing evils" was prevalent.
